subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nathalie Dechy reached her first final in four years with a 6-4, 3-6, 6-2 upset of fifth-seeded Amélie Mauresmo at the Western and Southern Financial Group Women’s Open in Mason, Ohio. Dechy will play Nadia Petrova, a 1-6, 6-2, 6-1 winner over Maria Kirilenko, in the other semifinal.
